title: Pen's Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Thai, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant on White Sands Beach offers tofu options. Kitchen stops at 9pm. Laid-back atmosphere. Has bungalows for rent.
streetAddress: Haad Sai Khao, White Sands Beach North
